item.title: About This Site
item.description: This site documents my apps, written as hobby projects. All are open source and I don’t make money from them. The page also hosts my Privacy Policy, which is required for apps to be listed in most app stores. Notes techniques / Technical notes This website is hosted by Github Pages Last updated 2021-02-03 10:48:18 -0500

item.title: App Privacy Policy
item.description:
• I do not collect personal data.
  • Data entered by you into the app is not sent to me or any third party.
  • My apps do not contain ads.
